body_html:
Ok, so can I assume that the pure-TF-ops implementation works now? That's good!

The benchmarks look a bit disappointing. But I see 2 things to try. For one, did you take a look at the timeline? Maybe it'll make it more clear what's eating the time. The other thing is that we should probably focus on larger sizes, how about (16K, 512) or so?

Thanks again for doing this! I think the pure-TF code is basically ready for review and checking-in, but it might be useful to think a bit more about performance first.

body:
Ok, so can I assume that the pure-TF-ops implementation works now? That's good!

The benchmarks look a bit disappointing. But I see 2 things to try. For one, did you take a look at the timeline? Maybe it'll make it more clear what's eating the time. The other thing is that we should probably focus on larger sizes, how about (16K, 512) or so?

Thanks again for doing this! I think the pure-TF code is basically ready for review and checking-in, but it might be useful to think a bit more about performance first.
